description: 50 Tripp Lite PDU servers must be purchased
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Details

* Publication date: February 13, 2024
* Closing date: February 19, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* Solicitation number: BPM020846/25601
* Amendment number: 1
* Tender type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Procurement Information

* Trade Agreement: Compliance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Method of Procurement: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: To be specified in the RFP document

## Project Overview

The Government of Canada, through Shared Services Canada (SSC), invites interested suppliers to submit proposals for the procurement of Tripp Lite PDU Automatic Transfer Switch (ATS) products. The Solicitation number is BPM020846/25601.

## Contact Information

Suppliers can direct their inquiries to:

Eleanor, Cesare
Phone: 613-219-8366
Fax: 613-960-6026
Email: [None]
Address: 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2H8

## Tender Documents

The tender documents are available on the Shared Services Canada website. Suppliers can access the documents at the following URLs:

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/AB01AEA8-E24A-4528-ACFA-00F37C78CBF8
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/B5C17155-8DB3-4CDA-8DFD-1166279A5235
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/C777C38C-A598-4C67-ABDA-A06D3EB60B88

Note: The tender documents are only available in English.

The closing date for submissions is Monday, February 19, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. Late submissions will not be accepted. Suppliers are responsible for ensuring their submitted proposals meet the requirements outlined in the RFP document.

Please note that the tender is now expired and is not accepting any new submissions. Suppliers can refer to the tender documents for the evaluation criteria.        
AWAITING F
